dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset containing articles in English, Greek, Russian, and Polish, specifically designed for epidemic event extraction. It includes 474 articles in English, 390 in Greek, 352 in Polish, and 426 in Russian, focusing on the detection of disease names and location names describing events.
dcterms:title: DANIEL
